ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The Human Release Hypothesis evolved during previous studies by H. Zimmermann, and we thank all co-authors involved in previous publications: D. Bran, M.A. Damascos, I. Hensen, H. Hirsch, D. Renison, C.M. Ritz, V. Wissemann, and K. Wesche. We also thank the two reviewers for their valuable suggestions.
